tns:patch.author: Alexandru Artimon
tns:patch.description: recreate view, this will always be the last version of the view

script.lang: SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_settings where settingsname='Recreate the views on the next server restart';

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_indicator_risk AS SELECT v.activity_id amp_activity_id, rr.rating_name::text risk, v.indicator_connection_id, v.rr_id id, v.indicator_id FROM ( SELECT con.activity_id, max(rr.amp_ind_risk_ratings_id) rr_id, con.id AS indicator_connection_id, con.indicator_id FROM amp_indicator_connection con, amp_indicator_values val LEFT JOIN amp_indicator_risk_ratings rr ON val.risk=rr.amp_ind_risk_ratings_id WHERE val.ind_connect_id = con.id AND con.sub_clazz::text = 'a'::text GROUP BY con.activity_id, con.id ) v LEFT JOIN amp_indicator_risk_ratings rr ON v.rr_id = rr.amp_ind_risk_ratings_id;
